author: sdwheeler
body: The Install docs for version 6 have been move to the Docs repo. Removed the installation folder from this repo and updated README.md to point to new published location.

comments.author: sdwheeler
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT I had a typo in the links. Fixed that. Should be good now.

comments.author: sdwheeler
comments.body: @TravisEz13 Sorry about that. Fixed in latest commit.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I filed https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-Docs/issues/2166 . We should have this implemented soon after we make the switch.
